name: Assassin's Ripper
effect: Class Bonus, Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Assassin's Ripper gets +2 until end of turn.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] REST, Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Assassin's Ripper gets +2 power until end of turn.

rule.description: Weapons can still be used for an attack even when they're rested.

flavor: As menacing as it is sharp, this dagger is most useful in the hands of an assassin.

name: Bauble of Abundance
effect: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
flavor: Glittering trinkets, coins, and treasures. Plenty enough to be shared among friend and foe alike.

editions.flavor: The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

name: Beastbond Boots
effect: Banish Beastbond Boots: Your champion gains spellshroud until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you control an Animal or Beast ally. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)
effect_raw: Banish Beastbond Boots: Your champion gains spellshroud until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you control an Animal or Beast ally. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)

rule.description: The condition of needing to control an Animal or Beast ally is only checked upon activating the ability of Beastbond Boots.

flavor: A tamer's bond with their beast goes beyond simple empathy.

name: Beastbond Ears
effect: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
effect_raw: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
flavor: The easiest way to gain a beast's favor is to first look like them.

name: Beastbond Paws
effect: Banish Beastbond Paws: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
effect_raw: Banish Beastbond Paws: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 power and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
flavor: A beast's ferocity and a tamer's guidance make for a formidable combination.

name: Crystal of Empowerment
effect: Banish Crystal of Empowerment: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
effect_raw: Banish Crystal of Empowerment: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
flavor: Mages often store their excess mana into such crystals. If used by even a novice mage, one might mistake them for far greater.

name: Curved Dagger
effect: Class BonusAs long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] As long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Its curved edge is perfect for slicing through the flesh of both man and monster.

name: Drawn Blade
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Oiled and sharpened, this sword can be unsheathed faster than a foe can react.

name: Endura, Scepter of Ignition
effect: , Remove an enlighten counter from your champion: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Activate this ability only at slow speed.
effect_raw: REST, Remove an enlighten counter from your champion: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Activate this ability only at slow speed.
flavor: Its spark glows vibrantly in otherworldly color. Some say the staff has an ominous origin, perhaps from a far more sinister world.

name: Fire Resonance Bauble
effect: Banish Fire Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Fire Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.
flavor: Captured, perhaps, but never tamed. This spirit's owner must always err on the side of caution.

name: Jewel of Enlightenment
effect: Banish Jewel of Enlightenment: Put an enlighten counter on your champion. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
effect_raw: Banish Jewel of Enlightenment: Put an enlighten counter on your champion. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
flavor: Recording their thoughts into gems, mages planned keenly for their posterity.

name: Mana Limiter
effect: You can't remove enlighten counters from your champion to pay for costs. Banish Mana Limiter: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has six or more enlighten counters on them.
effect_raw:
You can't remove enlighten counters from your champion to pay for costs. 
Banish Mana Limiter: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has six or more enlighten counters on them.

rule.description: Mana Limiter's static ability prevents you from using three enlighten counters to draw, in addition to any other effects that require you to remove enlighten counters as a cost.

name: Melodious Flute
effect: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally. Class BonusBanish Melodious Flute: The next Harmony action card you activate this turn is a Melody in addition to its other types.
effect_raw:
Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
[Class Bonus] Banish Melodious Flute: The next Harmony action card you activate this turn is a Melody in addition to its other types.

name: Ornamental Greatsword
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Target ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Target ally you control gets +1 power until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: An ornate and pristine sword used ceremoniously with great effect, though dull of edge.

name: Poisoned Dagger
effect: Poisoned Dagger enters the field rested. , Banish Poisoned Dagger: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Until end of turn, if that unit were to take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.
effect_raw:
Poisoned Dagger enters the field rested.
REST, Banish Poisoned Dagger: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Until end of turn, if that unit were to take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.
flavor: A little poison goes a long way.

name: Quicksilver Grail
effect: Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.) On Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down. Banish Quicksilver Grail: You may play the banished card. (You still pay for its costs.)
effect_raw:
Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.)
On Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down.
Banish Quicksilver Grail: You may play the banished card. (You still pay for its costs.)

rule.description: The face down banished by Quicksilver Grail has no properties. It has no name, types, effects, or stats. This means that effects that interact with cards in banishment that require seeing a certain property such as 'Sword' subtype won't be able to interact with this face down card.
The owner of the face down card may look at it at any time.

When Quicksilver Grail is banished to play the face down banished card, you play that card using its default play type. If the card has a reserve cost, that card is activated. If the card has a memory cost, that card is materialized.
The face down banished card being played still checks for elemental requirements and its costs must be paid.

result_editions.effect: Divine Relic On Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down. Banish Quicksilver Grail: You may play the banished card.

editions.effect: Divine Relic On Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down. Banish Quicksilver Grail: You may play the banished card.

name: Safeguard Amulet
effect: Banish Safeguard Amulet: If your champion would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.
effect_raw: Banish Safeguard Amulet: If your champion would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'Whenever your champion would take non-attack damage this turn' -> 'If your champion would take non-attack damage this turn'

flavor: Hopefully enough to block a fatal spell.

name: Seer's Sword
effect: Class BonusOn Attack: Glimpse 2. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Attack: Glimpse 2. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: Even a simple enchantment grants great advantage.

name: Sharpening Stone
effect: Banish Sharpening Stone: Up to one target Dagger or Sword weapon you control gets +1 until end of turn. Draw a card.
effect_raw: Banish Sharpening Stone: Up to one target Dagger or Sword weapon you control gets +1 power until end of turn. Draw a card.
flavor: Only neglect begets a dulled edge.

name: Smoke Bombs
effect: Banish Smoke Bombs: Target ally gains stealth until end of turn. Draw a card. (Units with stealth can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)
effect_raw: Banish Smoke Bombs: Target ally gains stealth until end of turn. Draw a card. (Units with stealth can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)

rule.description: If an unit is targeted by an attack without True Sight and gains stealth, the attack will lose its target. Attacks without a target do nothing during the damage step.

flavor:
"Where'd they go? They were right there!"
— Very Attentive Guard

name: Surveillance Stone
effect: Whenever an opponent declares an attack with a unit for the third time each turn, you may banish Surveillance Stone. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an opponent declares an attack with a unit for the third time each turn, you may banish Surveillance Stone. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: A simple tool that offers peace of mind and, with it, a good night's sleep.

name: Sword of Seeking
effect: Class BonusTrue Sight (Attacks using this weapon can target units with stealth. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] True Sight (Attacks using this weapon can target units with stealth. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Before this blade, nothing remains hidden.

name: Tome of Knowledge
effect: Class BonusYour champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Banish Tome of Knowledge: Draw a card.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Your champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Banish Tome of Knowledge: Draw a card.

name: Warrior's Longsword
effect: Class BonusWarrior's Longsword gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Warrior's Longsword gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: A dependable sword made of sturdy steel with an edge honed enough to pierce most defenses. A warrior's true companion.

name: Water Resonance Bauble
effect: Banish Water Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a water element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Water Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a water element champion.
flavor: Torrents crash and turn along the edges of this orb, waiting for their inevitable release.

name: Wind Resonance Bauble
effect: Banish Wind Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a wind element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Wind Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a wind element champion.
flavor: A spirit of wind sleeps within this bauble. Perhaps it will grant blessings once it wakes.
